scripts.sf-release: semantic-sf-release pre && semantic-sf-release genlog && npm run build && npm run upload && semantic-sf-release post
scripts.local-pkg: npm run build && yarn scriptfodder-publish --version-from-package --relative-to=dist --zip-only && shx rm -rf dist
scripts.local-release: semantic-sf-release pre --debug=false && semantic-sf-release genlog --debug=false && npm run build && npm run upload && semantic-sf-release post --debug=false
